welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Vaudreuil-Dorion, where the charm of small-town life meets the excitement of a bustling city. Explore our beautiful parks, historic sites, and charming downtown area, and immerse yourself in our vibrant culture. Enjoy your stay in our lovely city!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, mainly serving regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium service is also offered for a fee.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mirabel Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mirabel Airport is one of the busiest in Canada, handling a large volume of freight and mail.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Hubert Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at St Hubert Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
